title: BRIEF-Power Finance Corporation Says Fatehgarh-II Transco Limited Transferred To Power Grid Corporation Of India Limited
text:
BRIEF-Power Finance Corporation Says Fatehgarh-II Transco Limited Transferred To Power Grid Corporation Of India Limited

Stock Markets 12 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 13:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Power Finance Corporation Says Fatehgarh-II Transco Limited Transferred To Power Grid Corporation Of India Limited Oct 15 (Reuters) - Power Finance Corporation Ltd : * POWER FINANCE CORPORATION LTD -FATEHGARH-II TRANSCO LIMITED HAS BEEN TRANSFERRED TO POWER GRID CORPORATION OF INDIA (NS: ) LIMITED

BRIEF-Power Finance Corporation Says Fatehgarh-II Transco Limited Transferred To Power Grid Corporation Of India Limited
